official_title: An Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Minidoka project, Idaho, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with the American Falls Reservoir District or other appropriate agency for the construction of a dam and related facilities to replace the existing American Falls Dam of the Minidoko project, Idaho-Wyoming. Authorizes to be appropriated: (1) $400,000 for construction of facilities for public recreation and fish and wildlife enhancement, plus or minus such amounts as required by reason of the changes in costs of construction; (2) such funds as necessary to meet the cost of irrigation storage rights of the Michand Division of the Fort Hall Indian Reservation; and (3) such sums as required for the operation and maintenance of the dam and related facilities.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Upper Snake River project, Idaho.

An Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into agreements with non-Federal agencies for the replacement of the existing American Falls Dam, Minidoka project, Idaho, and for other purposes.
